participant_1.background:
I love listening to music while I eat my tuna fish salad.
I would love to have a pet dog but I can't because of my job.
I am not a morning person but my peace and quiet is important to me.
i am very familiar with hospitals and doctors.
I like drinking hot chocolate while I read my mermaid books.

participant_2.background:
I've managed to manage my diabetes well enough to become a bartender.
I build things with my hands and enjoy working with my dad.
my father lives in china.
i do not have any children.
i like to go to bars and people watch.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Hello! I am doing well, thank you! How about you?
I am doing pretty well, thanks! I am just sitting here reading a book about mermaids.
Mermaids? That's interesting! I've never really been into them.
I know, a lot of people aren't. But I love their stories! I like to listen to music while I read. Do you have any hobbies?
I love to build things with my hands. I like to work with my dad on projects. I also like to go to bars and people watch.
That's really cool! I wish I could build things with my hands. I'm not very good at it. I'm more of a reader and writer.
That's okay! Everyone has their own talents. I'm sure you're great at reading and writing.
Thanks! What do you like to read?
I like to read a lot of different things. I like science fiction, fantasy, and history.
I like those too! I also like to read about psychology and self-help.
Those are great! I've never really been into psychology, but I've heard it can be really helpful.
It can be! I've learned a lot about myself and how to better understand others.
That's awesome! I might have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It can be really helpful.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about books.
